About the band 
All began in the summer of 2003 when Simon Charette, Sebastien Audet, Christian Poulin and Charles Fontaine decided to start a death metal band called Wrecked Mind. At the end of 2003 the band had a change of heart because 3 of it&#039;s members (Christian Poulin, Sebastien Audet and Simon Charette) left to revive another band named Descend into nothingness. Finally D.I.N gave up for personal reasons in the year of 2005. Afterwards Francis Beaulieu, Simon Charette, Christian Poulin and Sebastien Audet gave birth to the project who now wears the name of Archons. The band has also recorded 2 promo songs (Delusional Beliefs, Plague of Corruption) with Pascal Letendre. 

Label: Cryogenic Records 
Formed: 2003 
Location: Rouyn-Noranda, Quebec 
Genre: Technical Melodic Death Metal 
Lyrical Theme: Society, Rebellion 

Current Line Up 
Sebastien Audet - Vocals, Bass 
Francis Beaulieu - Guitars 
Simon Charette - Guitars 
Christian Poulin - Drums 

Associated Bands 
Descend Into Nothingness
